newsitem.title: UK: NWE OIL PRODUCTS UP, MOGAS UP $9 TRADES AT $229.
newsitem.headline: NWE OIL PRODUCTS UP, MOGAS UP $9 TRADES AT $229.

text.p: NWE oil products firmed on Thursday as gasoline again led the market higher by climbing $9 a tonne from Wednesday's levels.
A prompt Rotterdam refinery barge traded at $229 and while a barge loading from Amsterdam or Rotterdam traded at $227. By comparison barges traded between $218.50 and $220 on Wednesday.
September swaps talked $203.50, a gain of $3.50 while October talked $192.75.
Gas oil gained $2.50 a tonne with IPE futures but premiums for physical oil were unchanged.
Heavy fuel edged up about 50 cents on good bunker demand.
